verses.verse: "Can you <S%H4900>draw<s%> out <S%H3882>Leviathan<s%> with a <S%H2443>fishhook<s%>? Or <S%H8257>press<s%> <S%H8257>down<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> with a <S%H9112>cord<s%>?
"Can you <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H100>rope<s%> in his <S%H639>nose<s%>? Or <S%H9344>pierce<s%> his <S%H3895>jaw<s%> with a <S%H2336>hook<s%>?
"Will he <S%H7235>make<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H8469>supplications<s%> to you? <S%H518>Or<s%> will he <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you <S%H7390>soft<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>?
"Will he <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you? Will you <S%H3947>take<s%> him for a <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%>?
"Will you <S%H7832>play<s%> with him as with a <S%H6833>bird<s%>? Or will you <S%H7194>bind<s%> him for your <S%H5291>maidens<s%>?
"Will the <S%H2271>traders<s%> <S%H3739>bargain<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him? Will they <S%H2673>divide<s%> him <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H9212>merchants<s%>?
"Can you <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H5785>skin<s%> with <S%H7905>harpoons,<s%> Or his <S%H7218>head<s%> with <S%H1709>fishing<s%> <S%H9487>spears<s%>?
<S%H7760>"Lay<s%> your <S%H3709>hand<s%> on him; <S%H2142>Remember<s%> the <S%H4421>battle;<s%> you will not <S%H3254>do<s%> it <S%H3254>again!<s%>
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> your <S%H8431>expectation<s%> is <S%H3576>false;<s%> Will you be <S%H2904>laid<s%> <S%H2904>low<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> at the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of him?
<S%H3808>"No<s%> one is so <S%H393>fierce<s%> that he dares to <S%H5782>arouse<s%> him; <S%H4310>Who<s%> then is he that can <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me?
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> has <S%H6923>given<s%> to Me that I should <S%H9608>repay<s%> [him?] [Whatever] is <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is Mine.
"I will not <S%H2790>keep<s%> <S%H2790>silence<s%> concerning his <S%H905>limbs,<s%> Or his <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H1369>strength,<s%> or his <S%H2433>orderly<s%> <S%H6187>frame.<s%>
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> can <S%H1540>strip<s%> <S%H1540>off<s%> his <S%H6440>outer<s%> <S%H3830>armor<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H935>come<s%> within his <S%H3718>double<s%> <S%H7448>mail<s%>?
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> can <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%>? <S%H5439>Around<s%> his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> there is <S%H367>terror.<s%>
"[His] <S%H4651>strong<s%> <S%H4043>scales<s%> are [his] <S%H1346>pride,<s%> <S%H5462>Shut<s%> up [as with] a <S%H9495>tight<s%> <S%H2368>seal.<s%>
<S%H259>"One<s%> is so <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H259>another,<s%> That <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7307>air<s%> can <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> them.
"They are <S%H1692>joined<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another;<s%> They <S%H3920>clasp<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> other and <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H6504>separated.<s%>
"His <S%H5846>sneezes<s%> <S%H9096>flash<s%> <S%H9096>forth<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> And his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are like the <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning.<s%>
"Out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H3940>burning<s%> <S%H3940>torches;<s%> <S%H3590>Sparks<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H4422>leap<s%> <S%H4422>forth.<s%>
"Out of his <S%H5156>nostrils<s%> <S%H6227>smoke<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> As [from] a <S%H5301>boiling<s%> <S%H1731>pot<s%> and [burning] <S%H100>rushes.<s%>
"His <S%H5315>breath<s%> <S%H3857>kindles<s%> <S%H1513>coals,<s%> And a <S%H3851>flame<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
"In his <S%H6677>neck<s%> <S%H3885>lodges<s%> <S%H5797>strength,<s%> And <S%H1670>dismay<s%> <S%H1750>leaps<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.
"The <S%H4651>folds<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> are <S%H1692>joined<s%> <S%H1692>together,<s%> <S%H3332>Firm<s%> on him and <S%H1077>immovable.<s%> <S%H4131><s%>
"His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as <S%H3332>hard<s%> as a <S%H68>stone;<s%> Even as <S%H3332>hard<s%> as a <S%H8482>lower<s%> <S%H6400>millstone.<s%>
<S%H4480>"When<s%> he <S%H7613>raises<s%> himself up, the <S%H410>mighty<s%> <S%H9076>fear;<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> of the <S%H7667>crashing<s%> they are <S%H2398>bewildered.<s%>
"The <S%H2719>sword<s%> that <S%H5381>reaches<s%> him <S%H1097>cannot<s%> <S%H6965>avail;<s%> <S%H1097>Nor<s%> the <S%H2595>spear,<s%> the <S%H9277>dart,<s%> or the <S%H9632>javelin.<s%>
"He <S%H2803>regards<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> as <S%H8401>straw,<s%> <S%H5154>Bronze<s%> as <S%H7539>rotten<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%>
"The <S%H1121>arrow<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> make him <S%H1272>flee;<s%> <S%H9521>Slingstones<s%> <S%H68><s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H7179>stubble<s%> for him.
<S%H8455>"Clubs<s%> are <S%H2803>regarded<s%> as <S%H7179>stubble;<s%> He <S%H7832>laughs<s%> at the <S%H7494>rattling<s%> of the <S%H3591>javelin.<s%>
"His <S%H8478>underparts<s%> are [like] <S%H2303>sharp<s%> <S%H2789>potsherds;<s%> He <S%H7502>spreads<s%> out [like] a <S%H9167>threshing<s%> <S%H9167>sledge<s%> on the <S%H2916>mire.<s%>
"He makes the <S%H4688>depths<s%> <S%H7570>boil<s%> like a <S%H5518>pot;<s%> He <S%H7760>makes<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> like a <S%H4841>jar<s%> of <S%H4841>ointment.<s%>
<S%H310>"Behind<s%> him he makes a <S%H5410>wake<s%> to <S%H215>shine;<s%> One would <S%H2803>think<s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> to be gray-haired.
<S%H369>"Nothing<s%> on <S%H6083>earth<s%> is <S%H9302>like<s%> him, One <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H2844>fear.<s%>
"He <S%H7200>looks<s%> on <S%H3605>everything<s%> that is <S%H1364>high;<s%> He is <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7830>pride.<s%>"
